Name: Strawberry & Balsamic Fruitini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of a fresh strawberry.
MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker.
Review: Balsamic adds extra bite to vodka-laced strawberries.
History: Adapted from a recipe created circa 2001 at Che Bar, St James's Street, London, and originally named Strawberry & Balsamic Martini. This cocktail was popular in London bars during 2002, then made with sugar syrup (in place of strawberry syrup).
